title: Gyaneshwar, Kathmandu
text:
Gyaneshwor is one of the central neighborhoods in the city of <a href="Kathmandu">Kathmandu</a>, <a href="Nepal">Nepal</a>. It is named after the ancient <a href="List%20of%20Hindu%20temples%20in%20Nepal">temple</a> of <a href="Gyaneshwor%20Mahadev%20%26amp%3B%20Bhairavsthan">Gyaneshwor Mahadev & Bhairavsthan</a> located there. It is a multi-cultural residential area with good facilities. Some major establishments located there are the <a href="List%20of%20diplomatic%20missions%20of%20Germany">German embassy</a> to Nepal, USEF, Mega Bank, Kaveri Inn, Valley Petrol Station, AT Burger House, <a href="Galaxy%20Public%20School">Galaxy Public School</a>, Mahendra Bhawan School etc.
The well known <a href="International%20Primary%20School%2C%20Gyaneshwor">International Primary School</a>, closed in 2011, was also located in Gyaneshwor, where multiple generations of Nepalis from all over Kathmandu started their early education.
The <a href="Association%20football">football</a> field of <a href="Sano%20Gaucharan">Sano Gaucharan</a> is located on the northern side of Gyaneshwor. It is one of the best areas to live in Kathmandu.
